EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-15 Partner Program Kickoff - EMEA.ES-2018-05-15 Partner Program Kicko
EmailTemplate.subject: New Turbonomic Partner Program Now Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are excited to announce that our new Turbonomic Partner Program is now live! This program puts our partners at the center of everything Turbonomic does, ensuring that you get the programs, tools and resources you need to be successful and grow your business. This includes:
- NEW! Partner Program Paths
- NEW! Competitive Discounts & Incentives
- NEW! Sales, Technical & Post-Sales Partner Accreditations
- NEW! Marketing Campaigns
- NEW! Partner Portal
Your Turbonomic Partner Director will reach out to you shortly to discuss the program details. In addition, please be on the lookout for an activation email and instructions on how to log into our new partner portal.
For any questions, please contact partnerdesk@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partnerdesk@turbonomic.com]]>.
Best Regards, Your Turbonomic Partner Team
